org.cougaar.core.domain
Class RootDomain

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.domain.RootDomain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Domain, GenericStateModel
public final class RootDomain
extends GenericStateModelAdapter
implements Component, Domain

This component is the minimal "root" domain that creates the basic RootPlan for other Domains and loads the RelayLP.

Instead of using the DomainAdapter as a base class, this simple domain directly implements the domain API for efficiency and illustative purposes.
